Package RentalApplication

Class RentalApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • RentalApplication.RentalApplication

  • public class RentalApplication
extends java.lang.Object

    RentalApplication

    This class generates the cars which belong to a car rental company and keeps a record of which cars are currently being rented and to which drivers they are rented to. It is also responsible for issuing cars to drivers and for terminating rentals once a car has been returned.
    Since:
    2018-02-12

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RentalApplication getInstance​()

      • availableCars

        public int availableCars​(java.lang.Boolean isSmallCar)
        A method for returning the amount of available cars of a given type (Small car or Large car).
        Parameters:
        isSmallCar - A boolean value of whether the car is small or not. If the car is not a small car, it must be a large car.
        Returns:
        An integer value of the number of cars of the specified type that are available to rent.

      • getFleet

        public java.util.Map<RegistrationNumber,Car> getFleet​()
        A method for returning a collection of cars in the rental agencies fleet.
        Returns:
        A collection of cars being rented.

      • getRentedCars

        public java.util.Map<DrivingLicence,Car> getRentedCars​()
        A method for returning a collection of cars which are currently being rented.
        Returns:
        A collection of cars being rented (if any).

      • addFleetCar

        public void addFleetCar​(RegistrationNumber regNo,
                        Car car)
        A method for adding a car to the fleet of cars.
        Parameters:
        regNo - A RegistrationNumber object.
        car - A Car object.

      • getCar

        public Car getCar​(DrivingLicence licence)
        A method for returning the car a driver is currently renting (if any).
        Parameters:
        licence - A driving licence object belonging to the driver who is being queried.
        Returns:
        A car object which is currently being rented to the driver specified (if any). Returns null if the driving licence specified is not currently associated with a rental car.

      • issueCar

        public boolean issueCar​(DrivingLicence licence,
                        java.lang.Boolean smallCar)
        A method for issuing a car to a driver. This method determines whether the person is eligible to rent a car of the specified type and, if there is a car available, issues a car of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        licence - A driving licence object belonging to the driver who is renting a car.
        smallCar - A boolean value of whether the car which is to be rented is small or not. If the car is not a small car, it must be a large car.
        Returns:
        A boolean stating whether or not a car has been issued. If a car is issued, the method will return true.

      • terminateRental

        public int terminateRental​(DrivingLicence licence)
        A method for terminating the rental contract associated with the given driving licence when a car is returned to the car rental company. A driver is liable for the cost of filling the tank on returning the car and so this method returns the amount of litres required to fill the tank. Upon executing this method, a rented car will then become available to rent again.
        Parameters:
        licence - A driving licence object belonging to the driver who is renting the car to be returned.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the amount of fuel (in litres) required to fill the car's tank.
